programme.title: Harta, Tahta, Cinta Ep2
programme.desc: Untuk memastikan rancangannya berjalan lancar, Chandra mendekati ramai janda kaya untuk menggunakan kekayaan mereka. Itulah yang dirasakan oleh Tiwi. Chandra sanggup menikahi Tiwi untuk kali kedua demi harta Tiwi. Chandra juga bekerjasama dengan kekasihnya untuk merampas kekayaan Tiwi.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep114
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Cewek Disaster Paham Cara FYP Di Hatiku
programme.desc: Pada mulanya, Lisna ingin membantu rakan baiknya, Nuri, kerana teman lelaki Nuri meninggalkannya dan berkahwin lain. Bagaimanapun, ia adalah salah faham, dan kini Lisna menjadi viral kerana dia merempuh perkahwinan selebriti terkenal.

programme.title: Rumahku Istanaku Ep3
programme.desc: Program realiti pertama di Indonesia yang berani menghadiahkan 1 unit rumah dan wang tunai untuk setiap episod.

programme.title: I Am Father
programme.desc: A magician was framed for murder by a corrupt detective. When his deceased wife's heart was found suitable for the detective's daughter transplantation, he decided to take revenge.

programme.title: Master
programme.desc: An intellectual crime investigation team goes after One Network, a company involved in a massive fraud and corruption case in Korea.

programme.title: My Wife Is A Gangster 3
programme.desc: The daughter of a Hong Kong triad boss is accused of killing the leader of their rivals. She goes into hiding in Korea and meets Ki-chul and his crew, who are assigned to protect her.

programme.title: Stellar: A Magical Ride
programme.desc: Chasing after a supercar in his father's beat-up Stellar, while being come after by local gangsters, Young Bae jog memories of his father bit by bit.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: An old huntsman risks his life to protect a village girl from a group of treasure hunters after they witness the men commit murder.

programme.title: Soar Into The Sun
programme.desc: An elite combat pilot carries a rescue mission to his missing teammate while facing threats from the north.

programme.title: Cheer Up, Mr Lee!
programme.desc: Unlike his heart-throb appearances, Mr. Lee, who has very child-like characteristics, embarks on a voyage of discovery with his young daughter ‘Saet-byeol’ whom he has just met.

programme.title: 200 Pounds Beauty
programme.desc: A timid, overweight and under-appreciated back-up singer resorts to drastic "head-to-toe" plastic surgery to become a pop diva.

programme.title: A Little Princess
programme.desc: A woman's life takes a turn for the better when she meets her granddaughter for the first time.

programme.title: Moby Dick
programme.desc: After a mysterious explosion destroys a bridge outside Seoul, three journalists dig deeper into the case, only to uncover a government conspiracy that is bigger than they could have ever imagined.

programme.title: The Spies
programme.desc: Kim, a North Korean spy who had lived in South Korea for 22 years is suddenly contacted by his superior. His team plans to complete an earlier mission and steal the target's large stockpile of cash.

programme.title: Toxic
programme.desc: Based on a true story, <Toxic> depicts the truth behind millions of mysterious death happened only in Spring.

programme.title: Good Deal
programme.desc: The stories of worn goods that build bridges between people from all walks of life begin with a little boy trying to buy a second-hand baseball jacket from a former baseball player.

programme.title: Deliver Us From Evil
programme.desc: A retired contract killer investigates a kidnapping case which may involve his next of kin, all the while relentlessly chased by his last target’s blood brother.

programme.title: Beautiful Vampire
programme.desc: A beautiful 500-year-old vampire has her carefully constructed quiet life put in jeopardy when she becomes attracted to her landlady's doltish son.

programme.title: Josee
programme.desc: Yong Seok helps Josée to get home after finding she has fallen from her electric wheelchair. From then on, the two meet up more often and starts developing feeling for one another.

programme.title: Soar Into The Sun
programme.desc: An elite combat pilot carries a rescue mission to his missing teammate while facing threats from the north.

programme.title: Hard Hit
programme.desc: On his way to work with his kids, a man received a mysterious call claiming he's sitting on a bomb that will go off if he gets out of his seat.

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: A rock climber tries to save the day after a mad scientist releases a toxic gas that leaves thousands stranded in skyscrapers in Seoul district.

programme.title: The Divine Fury
programme.desc: After waking up with mysterious wounds on his hands, a champion fighter finds himself in an otherworldly battle against evil forces that wreak havoc in the human world.

programme.title: Beasts Clawing At Straws
programme.desc: Driven by their own desperate desires, the destinies of 8 down-on-their-luck individuals slowly converge and come crashing down while chasing after a mysterious money bag.

programme.title: Where The Truth Lies
programme.desc: Two Korean-American students are accused of murder but the investigation is thrown into confusion when the two suspects present contradicting accounts and evidence, and blame each other for the crime.

programme.title: You Are My Sunshine
programme.desc: The marital bliss of Seok-jung and Eun-ha was threatened as Eun-ha was tested positive for HIV and met her abusive ex-husband again...

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Two Worlds
programme.desc: Having died unexpectedly, firefighter Ja-hong is taken to the afterlife by 3 guardians. To reincarnate, he must pass 7 trials in 49 days to prove that he led an upright life while he was still living.

programme.desc: New version of "You Are the One", two new sessions are added in the program. The "participants", who are single, can find their true love during the new games.

programme.title: The Lucky 2% Ep2
programme.desc: This is the first reality show about helping and rescuing the strays. Guests from different fields are invited to become volunteers in the animal welfare center, to provide the stray animals with treatment and love, and finally find suitable adopters for them.

programme.title: Sisters’ Treats Ep10
programme.desc: Ada Choi, Athena Chu, Monica Chan, and Catherine Hung, who are being friends for 30 years, work as partners to operate a restaurant together. With a young actor to be the manager in the restaurant, some activities with special features and gimmicks will be held to attract the young generations to visit and “check in”.

programme.title: Perfect Match (2019) Ep49

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep10191020
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45864587
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2608
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1037
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep48
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Way to Health(M) Ep195196
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about one’s health.

programme.title: Pingtung Spring Music Festival(M) Ep1
programme.desc: Pingtung Spring Music Festival is an annual activity held in every April in Pingtung, Taiwan. This year line-up is even stronger than last year, let's celebrate Spring with all the well-known artistes!

programme.title: Let’s Go Crazy on Live!(M) Ep2223
programme.desc: When the news reached her that the old village leader had passed away, Xiao Li, who was a personal shopper, stuffed a few things into her Hermes bag and, clutching the lucky salt he had once given her, set out for her home town wearing her Prada high-heeled shoes. That night A-Jian, who was helping out in a Japanese restaurant, also jumped on the bus and headed home as soon as he received the news. In his will, the old man divided up his salt fields among the villagers, but on the condition that A-Jian and Xiao Li get married. When they heard this, A-Jian and Xiao Li found themselves immediately surrounded…

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1037
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep48

programme.title: Way to Health(M) Ep195196
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about one’s health.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep440
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Let’s Go Crazy on Live!(M) Ep2223
programme.desc: As an ordinary girl, working an ordinary job, at an ordinary convenience store, Lin An An had only one dream in life: to find a good, stable, government job so she could support her aging grandfather. With that single dream in mind, An An never even thought of becoming anything more than the ordinary girl she had always been. But all that changed the day You Yuan Le walked into her life.

programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

With that single dream in mind, An An never even thought of becoming anything more than the ordinary girl she had always been. But all that changed the day You Yuan Le walked into her life.

programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about one’s health.

programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1037
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep964
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep819820
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep664
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep441
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Young Days No Fears(M) Ep2223
programme.desc: The six girls, as good friends, have gone through their difficulties and crises in relationship, at work, and in their marriage together. Despite many challenges in life, they are not afraid. They have got each other’s back.

programme.title: Horseplay
programme.desc: Ha Mui goes to London to track down an art thief, Nine-Tailed Fox, who is interested in a pottery horse from the Tang Dynasty. Cheung Ho is a cop who chases after Nine-Tailed Fox since he escaped years ago. The trio must work together to gain the pottery, with Nine-Tailed Fox being hunted by his rivals at the same time.

programme.title: Europe Raiders
programme.desc: Mr Lin and Miss Wang are the two top bounty hunters in the business, and are searching for the destructive missile “Hand of God” to prove who is the better bounty hunter. They soon realize they are not the only ones after the missile. Will Lin and Wang put their differences aside and work together in search for the ‘Hand of God’?

programme.title: Never Too Late
programme.desc: Alex Fong and Cecilia So star as two lost souls in this romantic comedy. One has constantly been physically abused and cheated on by his girlfriend, the other was a former beer girl turned into a wandering spirit following a car accident. As the two begin to spend time together, love begins to repair their broken hearts.

programme.title: Adventure of the King
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor Zhengde flees the palace to see the world after his mother orders him to marry an ugly princess. He disguises as a commoner and escapes with his advisors, but a gambling mishap causes them to part ways and Zhengde lost all his money. Phoenix, the owner of Lung Fung Inn, takes him in out of pity, and thus begins his new adventure...

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: Young Heroes of Chaotic Times
programme.desc: This story is set in Shanghai in the late Qing Dynasty, and talks about a young man, Chen Zhen, who rises to become a national hero after enduring hardships and overcoming challenges in life.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hong Kong
programme.desc: This is a story of ICAC investigators fighting against rampant corruption in early 1970s’ Hong Kong. A police sergeant teams up with a triad boss to make billions of dollars in bribes. As a lawyer joins his friend in ICAC to investigate their collusion and fight against corruption, the battle between the righteous and the wicked has just begun.

programme.title: Mr McDreamy
programme.desc: A second generation rich man squanders his parents’ money and calls himself Mr McDreamy. When his parents finally have enough and cut him off financially, he establishes a “Mr McDreamy Training Academy” using various unconventional means to transform his four recruits into “Mr McDreamies” with hilarious results.

programme.title: Genghis Khan
programme.desc: Before he became the great Khan he was known as Temüjin, and was deeply in love with his childhood sweetheart Börte. News of Temüjin's father's death disrupted their relationship and as Temüjin heads back home, he faces a sudden attack from his father's former comrades, causing his whole tribe to be destroyed.

programme.title: Miao Miao
programme.desc: Miao Miao is an awkward young beauty who nevertheless enchants her outgoing classmate Xiao Ai. As Xiao Ai’s feelings for Miao Miao grows from friendship to something more, Miao Miao discovers her own burgeoning attraction to a sullen CD store owner, and quietly pursues him.

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: The Rise of Hero
programme.desc: Young Wong Fei Hung studies hard for an exam in Guangzhou to win a chance to study abroad. However, Eunuch Hai plans to abort the overseas project and this conflict evolves into a real fight. Wong finally defeats Hai on his own and ensure the smooth continuation of the Study Abroad Campaign.

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: Justice Sung Sai Kit
programme.desc: An actor who portrayed the famous Justice Sung Sai Kit is sent back in time to the Qing dynasty after he meets a mysterious woman. There, he reprises his role as a lawyer and sets out to protect the poor from the wealthy. However, as time travelling is outlawed, the time-travel police are on the hunt to stop the duo from changing history.

programme.title: Kungfu Stuntmen
programme.desc: Hong Kong action cinema is famous for its real kung fu moves performed by a group called “Kung Fu Stuntmen”. This docu-film pays tribute to the generations of kung fu stuntmen, with the crew spending over two years digging archives and interviewing many talents, including the most prominent masters like Jackie Chan, Donnie Yen and Sammo Hung.

programme.title: Two Wrongs Make a Right
programme.desc: When an internationally-renowned Feng Shui Master, Ray, forecasts a predestined doom ahead, he sets out to find an ill-fated wretch to serve as the scapegoat of his mishaps and finds Pei Pei. Little did Ray expect to fall in love with her and must decide whether their relationship is worth the series of unfortunate events that would follow.

programme.title: The Thousand Faces of Dunjia
programme.desc: A young constable unwittingly gets involved with a secret organization named Wu Yin Men, where all members have supernatural abilities and have protected mankind for centuries. When he learns that mysterious demons with power to destroy the world are increasing, the adventure to hunt them down with Wu Yin Men begins!

programme.title: Come Back Home
programme.desc: In a chilly winter, De and his family goes on a self-drive tour to Changbai Mountain. The holiday turns tragic when De’s eight-year-old son goes missing. He seeks help from the local police but is unable to find his son. Though the golden hour has passed, De and the rescue team insist on continuing the search. Can they finally rescue the boy?

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: Stephen Chow plays an arrogant god in Heaven who is being punished for his pranks and mistakes. He is sent to Earth and reincarnate as Mad Monk to change the destiny of three misguided souls - a prostitute, a beggar and a villain. The Mad Monk needs to complete the task in three days in order to return to Heaven.

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow 2018
programme.desc: In this remake of John Woo's legendary heroic bloodshed movie, a former drug smuggler attempts to start his life anew and repair his relationship with his estranged brother, who is a rising star in the Police Narcotics Division.

programme.title: Girls VS Gangsters
programme.desc: A bachelorette weekend spins hilariously out of control when three friends wake up naked on a beach and find themselves handcuffed to a mysterious briefcase, with local gangsters in pursuit. They must regain memories of what happened that weekend if they hope to go back home safely!

programme.title: Tales from the Occult
programme.desc: The movie consists of three tales about the horrors lurking in dark corners of the city. A young pop star goes back into depression when spooky things happen in her new home; an online influencer performs live in a mall, but it ends up being a livestream of his death; the residents of a tenement building battle a mysterious figure in the stairwell.

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: Manhunt
programme.desc: In this movie directed by John Woo, lawyer Du goes on the run after he is framed for a murder. Veteran detective Yamura suspects the case to be more complicated than it seems, and while he understands Du better during the hunt, Yamura still doubts his innocence. Is the real killer lurking elsewhere? Is there a hidden conspiracy behind the murder?

programme.title: The Lady Improper
programme.desc: Siu Man is divorced by her husband due to her fear of intimacy. After that, she wants to restart her life by taking over her father’s restaurant. Siu Man hires a new chef with unique culinary philosophy that revitalizes her. Tired of the shackles she placed on herself, Siu Man embarks on a journey of self-discovery and sexual liberation.

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters’ best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Set in 2020 during the outbreak of COVID-19, the movie features interconnected stories of three women's lives as they navigate the uncertain future amongst their respective friends and families. From the struggles at home to challenges in relationships and conflicts at work, these three women rise with strength when faced with plights unknown.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Fok Kit is the hottest underground boxer with unbeatable records. To save their boxing studio from being sold, he must win the fight against Shaolin who is known as "Killing Machine". Fok Kit is defeated and badly hurt in the fight, which is a set-up by Lok, who wants to take revenge on Fok Kit’s master, Debo.

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: True Legend
programme.desc: Su Can was once a top general but choose to return to his hometown to study martial arts and enjoy family time with his wife and son. However, his wife was killed and the family became victims of conspiracies. Su was heartbroken and wandered like a beggar with his son. One day, he met the "God of Martial Arts" and learnt Drunken Fist from him.

programme.title: Hong Kong Family
programme.desc: Eight years ago, the family in a Hakka-walled village was torn apart during a combative winter solstice dinner. Eight years later, their cousin returns home from England and seeks to reunite the family for another winter solstice dinner. While things seem to be falling apart, this dinner may well be an opportunity to mend relations.

programme.title: Carry on Doctors and Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: The Shadow Whip
programme.desc: Three hundred thousand silver is robbed by a thief using a whip as the weapon. As it is a signature weapon used by a martial arts master named “Shadow Whip”, he is suspected and hunted. No one sees him after that. Fifteen years later, a young girl Yang shows up using the same weapon. Who is this girl and what has happened to “Shadow Whip”?

programme.title: Fast Fingers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Uncle Bill returns to make a fortune with his past thieving partners. They continue to prey on the unsuspecting public, but are closely watched by the upright police chief, who happens to be the boyfriend of one of Uncle Bill’s nieces!

programme.title: The Killer Has No Return
programme.desc: Professional killer Lui goes to Malaysia after completing his mission of killing the big boss of a Hong Kong gang. His next target is a groom who is throwing his wedding banquet at a hotel in Chinatown. Just when Lui takes aim at his target, another victim instead of the groom is shot, and he becomes a scapegoat in this mystery assassination.

programme.title: Sex, Love and Hate
programme.desc: This masterpiece spins three interconnected tales about Hong Kong society's differing views on love and what women want from love. Follow a trio of Hong Kong women as they explore relationships and fulfil their hopes of finding true love.

programme.title: Shaolin Abbot
programme.desc: Monk Chi San is sent by his Shaolin Master to learn a special kung fu from a Wu Dang priest. He gets embroiled in the fight between the Qing and Ming camps and has to gather disciples to rebuild the burnt Shaolin temple at the same time.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Singer Qing Qing and architect Tang Peng Nan are a sweet couple. Qing Qing sacrifices herself to help Peng Nan at a time when his family is going through difficulties and is misunderstood by Peng Nan, leading to their break up. When Peng Nan learns the truth and decides to make up with Qing Qing, he found that she is suffering from a terminal illness.

programme.title: The Duel
programme.desc: After knowing his brother has killed the head of a rival triad, Jie takes the blame and was hunted by killers. With the help of Rambler Nan, Jie finally killed his enemies, but then found out that Nan is the one who has killed his father.

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: Mercenaries From Hong Kong
programme.desc: Filmmaker Wong Jing produced Mercenaries From Hong Kong, his very first modern-day adventure drama. In the dramatic plot he wrote, he sends superstars Ti Lung, Chen Hui-min, Wang Lung-wei, Lo Lieh and Wang Yu on a deadly mission. The film's action sequences are all closely guided by three great kung fu choreographers, led by Tang Chia!

programme.title: Return of the Phoenix
programme.desc: An imperial minister Cheng betroths his pretty younger daughter, Ye, to his friend's son, Mu. His wife however, refuses to let Ye marry before her elder daughter Yan, who is ugly and undesirable. Yan is asked to pretend as Ye to meet Mu but scares him away. A rich guy who likes Ye meanwhile pretends as Mu to attend the wedding...

programme.title: My Name Ain't Suzie
programme.desc: Young Mei Li works as a bar girl in Wanchai to make a living. When she meets Jimmy in the bar, she thinks he is her true love and falls crazily in love with him. When Jimmy has to leave, Mei Li is devastated. It is not until she encounters the triad boss Ying that she finally found someone to count on.

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Double Bliss tells the story of two students who fall in love and want to wed, but there is one small snag: their parents don't agree! The two ingenious lovebirds come up with what they think is a foolproof plan...They play dead!

programme.title: Pale Passion
programme.desc: Fa is an obsessive man who loves his wife Ah Hsia but is easily jealous and abuses her. When she leaves him one day, Fa hooks up with another woman, Hsing. A deadly triangle develops when Fa runs into Ah Hsia again and decides to win her back…

programme.title: Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Wei Chun is a cocky young man sentenced to jail for killing a man in a fight. One day, Wei Chun picks a fight with a seemingly defenseless old man who completely thrashes him! The old man turns out to be the master of monkey style kung fu and as they become friends, he gives Wei Chun half of a medallion that would direct him to hidden secrets.

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: The Golden Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman supreme Cheng Pei-pei (Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon) teams up with director/writer/actor Lo Wei (director of Bruce Lee and Jackie Chan’s first major movies) for an evocative and terrific “Martial arts world” adventure consisting of a missing blade and a deadly sect of men-hating swordswomen.

programme.title: My Son
programme.desc: Kuo, a police’s son, blames his father for his mother’s death. He has no job, spends time in night clubs and always gets into fights. One night, Kuo rescues Mei from being raped and they become friends. Kuo wants to support Mei and her family so he goes gambling hoping to gain more money but bad luck seems to be following them with tragic outcomes.

programme.title: Five Tough Guys
programme.desc: A titular gang of misfits come together to protect a patriotic general from a scheming usurper. To this end, the unlikely heroes act as the general’s escorts on a dangerous journey to a distant British consulate, beset by enemies and sinister Japanese interference along the way.

programme.title: The Three Smiles
programme.desc: A talented scholar, Bo Hu, is attracted by the pretty maid, Qiu Xiang. In order to get close to her and win her love, he disguises as a servant to work in the same household. Qiu Xiang does not believe Bo Hu when he discloses his true identity to her, only falling in love with him when he reveals his talents and with his friends’ help.

programme.title: The Delightful Forest
programme.desc: The legendary hero Wu Sung is sent to a prison in Meng province after murdering his adulterous sister-in-law and her lover. While in prison, the officer Shih En spares Wu the humiliating baton punishment. Owing Shih a favour, Wu decides to help Shih get his restaurant back at all costs when it was forcefully taken over by a local thug.

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This side-splitting comedy sees naive Ah Niu headed to Hong Kong, where he is repeatedly exploited and taken advantage of, and eventually finds himself arrested and imprisoned! Can he survive difficult times and finally overcome adversity?

programme.title: The Brave Archer 3
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong go to Iron Palm Peak to search for the Book of Wumu. The chief of Iron Palm discovers their visit, and seriously injures Huang. It seems only the Southern Emperor Duan can heal her, but will Huang be healed in time?

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: The Singing Thief
programme.desc: A master jewel thief turns over a new leaf as a professional singer in a nightclub. However, a series of robberies happened shortly after and he becomes the suspect again. The thief then sets up a trap to snare the copycat but will this backfire on him?

programme.title: Heaven and Hell
programme.desc: When an angel, Ling, decides to help his two friends who have fallen in love to escape from Heaven, he is sent to live as a human on earth as his punishment. Reincarnated as a cab driver, he sacrifices his own life to save another ill-fated couple and lands in hell, where he has to face off against the ghosts and demons to fight his way out!

programme.title: The Adventures of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his people’s livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
programme.desc: A beautiful but ignorant woman is abducted by aliens but nobody believes her close encounter. While planning a suicide to prove herself, she meets a failed detective who is also planning his suicide. They change their minds about dying after finding each other and start to encounter bizarre adventures, before falling in love with each other.

programme.title: The New One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: David Chiang plays the all-new one-armed hero - a man who chops off his right arm rather than live with dishonor. When the love of his life is kidnapped and his best friend is murdered by the evil gang, it is time to battle.

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her family’s objection, so Hong’s maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: Little Hero
programme.desc: An orphan, Little Bastard is taken on and trained as a fighter by a hermit. When Little Bastard grows up, he feels he is old enough to go out and look for his parents. Luckily for him, he befriends a beggar, Hsiao Yi, who being street-wise, manages to help him find his family, but somehow gets into trouble with the gang.

programme.title: Fangs of the Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the film's hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: The Black Falcon
programme.desc: Jenny Hu and veteran co-star Margaret Tu Chuan join longtime0020idol Paul Chang Chung in a battle against the notorious Black Falcon crime mob in Singapore. Together they have to face forgery, fire, and even poisoned needles to stop the mob.

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: Duel For Gold
programme.desc: Six swordsmen, including two sisters and their husbands, a ranger and a security man, are trying to steal a million gold taels from the Fu Lai Treasury House, not knowing that one of them is actually an undercover hero. In their quest, they have to double-cross and outwit one another...

programme.title: Diau Charn
programme.desc: In the Han Dynasty, the tyrannical Prime Minister Dong Zuo takes control of the country, so Minister Wang plots to take him down using Diau Charn’s beauty. Wang arranges for her to be Dong’s concubine as he knows Dong’s adopted son Lu Bu is in love with her, turning them against each other. Lu Bu ends up killing Dong Zuo to be with Diau Charn.

programme.title: Irumbuthirai
programme.desc: Tamil Action Movie, Starring, Vishal, Samantha Akkineni, Arjun Sarja, Sreeja Ravi & others

programme.title: Mappla Singam
programme.desc: Tamil Comedy Film, Starring, Vimal, Anjali, Soori & Others

programme.title: Stalin
programme.desc: Tamil Actionl political drama, Starring - Chiranjeevi & Trisha

programme.title: Chithirai Sevvanam
programme.desc: Tamil Thriller Film, Starring, Rima Kallingal, Pooja Kannan, Pranavbond, Samuthirakani & Others

programme.title: Kanni Rasi
programme.desc: Romance, Comedy Film, Starring, Varalaxmi Sarathkumar,Pandiarajan,Yogi Babu,Vimal

programme.title: Rajini Murugan
programme.desc: Tamil Film, Starring, Sivakarthikeyan, Keerthi Suresh, Soori & Others

programme.title: Yaman
programme.desc: Tamil Action Film, Starring, Vijay Antony, Mia George, Thiyagarajan & Others

programme.title: Free Ticket
programme.desc: Film Songs

programme.title: Free Ticket
programme.desc: Film Songs

programme.title: Free Ticket
programme.desc: Film Songs

programme.title: Lokpal

programme.desc: In this dark satire, a divorced couple fight over who has custody of their children. Both have glittering career prospects abroad and each tries, with hilarious result, to convince their children that they are better off with the other parent.

programme.title: The Coroner: The Miracle
programme.desc: The mutilated corpse of a young girl buried alive is found in a cemetery. Known as a saint who could heal the sick, detectives look into the details of her “holy” reputation. Faith, superstition and trickery – the line between each is razor thin.

programme.title: Nobadi
programme.desc: Heinrich, a cranky 93-year-old, hires Afghan refugee, Adib, to dig his dog’s grave. Adib falls unconscious from a wound but refuses to go to a hospital for fear of deportation. And the two strangers, Heinrich and Adib, spend a dramatic night together.

programme.title: Run To You
programme.desc: Gianni is a serial seducer, but his life is destined to change when he meets Chiara, a beautiful woman who has had an accident and is paraplegic.

programme.title: Ignorance Is Bliss
programme.desc: Ernesto and Filippo are two polar opposite, rival teachers: one is old-fashioned and straight-laced while the other is free and spontaneous. When they’re issued a challenge to fit into the shoes of the other, a series of hilarious misadventures befall them.

programme.title: Joy Of Fatherhood
programme.desc: Felix enjoys his single life to the fullest, but a ferret bites him, sterilizing him in the process. He tries everything in his power to find the soon-to-be mother of his only child, the result of his first and last sperm donation.

programme.title: Don't Mess With Klara
programme.desc: Klara is a gifted cyber-agent who enjoys keeping both her professional and personal life under strict control. When her boyfriend suddenly breaks up with her for a new girl, she uses her skills to sabotage their relationship with hilarious consequences.

programme.title: It's Your Turn, Honey!
programme.desc: In this dark satire, a divorced couple fight over who has custody of their children. Both have glittering career prospects abroad and each tries, with hilarious result, to convince their children that they are better off with the other parent.

programme.title: Murder In The Larzac
programme.desc: An important breeder has been assassinated. The case is complex as there are several possible suspects – the lovelorn girlfriend, the jealous ex-wife, the rugby player foe or the farmer he fell out with? The truth is buried deep beneath secrets and lies.

programme.title: The Coroner: The Miracle
programme.desc: The mutilated corpse of a young girl buried alive is found in a cemetery. Known as a saint who could heal the sick, detectives look into the details of her “holy” reputation. Faith, superstition and trickery – the line between each is razor thin.

programme.title: Equilibrium
programme.desc: Giuseppe is a priest who’s replacing the bishop of a small town near Naples. He is given the dangerous task of prohibiting the illegal dumping of industrial waste by the mafia. But his spiritual faith is tested as the dangers of his task start mounting.

programme.title: Nobadi
programme.desc: Heinrich, a cranky 93-year-old, hires Afghan refugee, Adib, to dig his dog’s grave. Adib falls unconscious from a wound but refuses to go to a hospital for fear of deportation. And the two strangers, Heinrich and Adib, spend a dramatic night together.

programme.title: Meisie
programme.desc: A young school teacher is posted to a small rural town, where she meets Meisie, a gifted girl who wants to learn but isn’t allowed to. Before she can teach Meisie, the teacher must first convince her father of the benefits and importance of education.

programme.title: Run To You
programme.desc: Gianni is a serial seducer, but his life is destined to change when he meets Chiara, a beautiful woman who has had an accident and is paraplegic.

programme.title: Parents Home Alone: Ms Busche
programme.desc: After her son leaves for college, Katrin, a single mother, finds love again. However, her happiness is fleeting as challenges implode in her life. Her father has an accident, her ex-husband tries to repossess the house and her son unexpectedly returns home.

programme.title: Verdict
programme.desc: Joy, mother of a six-year-old girl, lives in constant fear of her abusive husband, Dante. One day, Joy flees home and seeks help from the police. As time passes, she discovers an equally nightmarish bureaucracy that cruelly denies her justice and reprieve.

programme.title: Dying To Defrost
programme.desc: This poor vampire has lived through the centuries, freezing down to the marrow! She’s at the end of her tether and she’s had enough. She’s going to do whatever it takes to feel the warmth on her skin, or it’ll be the death of her, AGAIN!!

programme.title: Bunny Kicks
programme.desc: A rabbit couple unexpectedly have a kitten and they struggle to raise her amongst their rabbit-only community.

programme.title: Oddball

programme.title: Body Of Lies
programme.desc: Trust no one. Deceive everyone. When idealistic CIA agent Roger Ferris (Di Caprio -- The Departed, Blood Diamond) is stationed in Jordan after being wounded in Iraq, he dedicates his life to stopping further attacks by Al Qaeda. Following a plan that the British employed successfully against the Nazis, Ferris plants the suspicion among the terrorists that their leaders are collaborating with the Americans. But as the stakes rise and Ferris finds himself in the crosshairs, the plot he starts spirals into an outcome he could never have foreseen.

programme.title: The Dark Knight
programme.desc: Christian Bale and director Christopher Nolan reunite following their blockbuster success with Batman Begins! This time, Heath Ledger joins the cast as The Joker, and Aaron Eckhart stars as Harvey Dent in an all-new adventure of The Dark Knight.With the help of Lieutenant Jim Gordon (Gary Oldman) and new district attorney Harvey Dent (Eckhart--Thank You for Smoking), Batman sets out to destroy organized crime in Gotham City forever. The three enjoy early success, but they soon find themselves prey to a rising criminal mastermind known as The Joker (Ledger--Brokeback Mountain), who throws Gotham into anarchy and forces Batman ever closer to crossing the line between hero and vigilante.

programme.desc: Choc Full Of Impressions - Nine remaining home bakers use everyday items to make lasting chocolate impressions on the judges. Immunity is on the line for the bakers who are hoping for a fruitful outcome in the chocolate elimination challenge.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep3
programme.desc: Chocolate Panning, Spice & Everything Nice - The eight home bakers take on the ancient chocolate making technique of panning. The Chocolate Elimination Challenge gets a little spicy when the bakers are asked to infuse some fun flavors into their confections.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep4
programme.desc: Mirror, Mirror On The Glaze - Seven remaining competitors strive to mirror perfection when Chef Anna Olson teaches them how to use a mirror glaze technique. The home bakers create a decadent dessert inspired by a bestselling chocolate treat.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep5
programme.desc: I Have A Confection To Make - Only six home bakers remain and it's truly a spectacle, as they work in teams to take on the crown jewel of chocolate confections: the bonbon. It's bon voyage for one baker who fails to deliver an indulgent dessert.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep6
programme.desc: Life Is What You Bake It - The remaining bakers create centerpieces out of ordinary cupcakes.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep7
programme.desc: Don't Be Afraid To Take Whisks - A 3D chocolate molding Technique Test gives the bakers one last chance to impress the judges and secure their spot in the final 3. One baker is given the opportunity of a lifetime.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep8
programme.desc: The Finale: Good Things Come To Those Who Bake - The top three home bakers take on their toughest challenge yet: creating an epic assortment of show-stopping confections to fill their dream Bake Shop window.

programme.desc: It's Time To Glaze The Bar - The eight home bakers make a solar system cake for their technique test.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S2 Ep4

programme.desc: Bake It Till You Make It - The five remaining home bakers must create a beautiful collection of bonbons for their Technique Test. In the Elimination Challenge, the bakers must create a dessert showcasing chocolate as a solid, liquid and a gas.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S2 Ep7
programme.desc: A Legend In The Baking - The final four bakers must create theatrical desserts where chocolate takes center stage.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S2 Ep8
programme.desc: You Bake My Dreams Come True - In the season finale, the home bakers take on the most demanding bake of the entire competition - creating a sweet, delicious, show-stopping bakeshop display. One home baker will walk away with the $50, 000 grand prize.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep1
programme.desc: The World Needs S'more People Like You - Ten home bakers must create a dessert that represents their personality.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep2

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep3

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep4
programme.desc: Mirror, Mirror On The Glaze - Seven remaining competitors strive to mirror perfection when Chef Anna Olson teaches them how to use a mirror glaze technique. The home bakers create a decadent dessert inspired by a bestselling chocolate treat.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep5
programme.desc: I Have A Confection To Make - Only six home bakers remain and it's truly a spectacle, as they work in teams to take on the crown jewel of chocolate confections: the bonbon. It's bon voyage for one baker who fails to deliver an indulgent dessert.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep6
programme.desc: Life Is What You Bake It - The remaining bakers create centerpieces out of ordinary cupcakes.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep7
programme.desc: Don't Be Afraid To Take Whisks - A 3D chocolate molding Technique Test gives the bakers one last chance to impress the judges and secure their spot in the final 3. One baker is given the opportunity of a lifetime.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep8
programme.desc: The Finale: Good Things Come To Those Who Bake - The top three home bakers take on their toughest challenge yet: creating an epic assortment of show-stopping confections to fill their dream Bake Shop window.

programme.desc: Wine’s New Friend - Join two seriously ill orangutans in the medical clinic, where Erik’s head infection is causing concern and fourteen-year-old Mia’s life depends on a blood transfusion. Outside the clinic, the infants find a secret treat hidden inside a rubber tree.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Brisbane Floods - Wade into recovery mode as the clinic deals with the animal aftermath of a Brisbane flood. Meet a baby kangaroo in need of round-the-clock care and a plover washed down a drain. Then size up the turtle waiting list that vet Karina patiently tackles.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Fly Free - Observe vet Karina’s fight to save a koala mauled by dogs, then face the clinic’s toughest customer with vet Tim: a rainbow lorikeet who’s quick to bite. Scoop up a peeved possum with rescuer Chantel and bond with Meaghan over a gaggle of goslings.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Join the rescue team as they respond to a call about an opossum stuck in a fence that turns out not to be the kind of animal that plays dead. Inside the center, a goose with a serious foot injury receives physiotherapy before returning to the wild.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Bahamas Hollywood Wrecks - The Bahamas is known as the “underwater movie capital of the world”. Hollywood has been coming here for decades, making epic movies and TV shows in its crystal clear waters, leaving behind a host of cinematic shipwrecks.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Kgalagadi Transfrontier Park - In the southern reaches of Africa’s great Kalahari basin, everything is made tough. Ancient rivers harbor water deep underground, and these hidden lifelines forge a fragile link to survival. This is the Kgalagadi Transfrontier Park.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Rescuers - Dogs around the world come to the rescue in surprising ways. Some search for survivors when disaster strikes or rescue animals from poachers and wildlife traffickers. Others help us in times of trouble—both on land and in the water.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Lifesavers - Meet a border collie that protects aircraft from lethal bird strikes, a sprocker spaniel whose sense of smell is saving imperilled water voles, and an Anatolian shepherd that helps conserve Africa’s most endangered big cat, the cheetah.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Arabia: Kingdom of the Sun - Visit one of the most arid and hottest parts of the world to discover how dhub lizards and dromedary camels adapted to withstand the intense conditions. Then move into the more moderate southern mountains, where rare hyrax and chameleons forage.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Wine’s New Friend - Join two seriously ill orangutans in the medical clinic, where Erik’s head infection is causing concern and fourteen-year-old Mia’s life depends on a blood transfusion. Outside the clinic, the infants find a secret treat hidden inside a rubber tree.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep9
programme.desc: Follow an injured opossum into surgery, as the medical team realizes amputation may be the only way to save his badly injured toe. And meet some turtle hatchlings who seem ready for release when the team gets disappointing details about their size.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Brisbane Floods - Wade into recovery mode as the clinic deals with the animal aftermath of a Brisbane flood. Meet a baby kangaroo in need of round-the-clock care and a plover washed down a drain. Then size up the turtle waiting list that vet Karina patiently tackles.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Fly Free - Observe vet Karina’s fight to save a koala mauled by dogs, then face the clinic’s toughest customer with vet Tim: a rainbow lorikeet who’s quick to bite. Scoop up a peeved possum with rescuer Chantel and bond with Meaghan over a gaggle of goslings.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep10
programme.desc: Meet a flock of cedar waxwings who have taken over the center’s aviary and are keeping the staff busy with endless demands for food. Then the rescue team works with the Ministry of Natural Resources to relocate a coyote that’s too people-friendly.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Foxes - Wild Wild East travels to Prince Edward Island to explore the family life of the Red Fox. These sly creatures are adept at living just on the fringes of the human world.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Little Penguin - Follow the story of Harry and Sally, a pair of little penguins. These flightless, flippered birds create some of the noisiest neighborhoods in nature. Theirs is a family saga of faithful relationships, committed homemaking, and vigorous nightlife.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Secret Life of the Emu - The Emu is Australia’s biggest native bird and is the second largest bird in the world after the African ostrich: two meters tall, with an almost three metre running stride and totally flightless. This bird inhabits a topsy turvy world, where females call the shots, eggs are green and men do all the work to produce and raise tiny babies, known as Stripeys.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Aerial Hunters - Australia’s birds of prey are some of the region's fiercest predators. These highly specialised killers are powerful, resourceful and striking; they use some impressive weapons to survive. This is the story of Australia’s aerial hunters.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Feathering Nest - Successful breeding is critical to the survival of any bird species, and in this episode we meet four species of birds which go to exceptional lengths to find mates and raise their young, giving the next generation the best chance of life. Wherever they live, these birds have got their work cut out, holding their territory against invaders, attracting and winning partners and safeguarding their chicks.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Frida the Jaguar Cub - Test limits with jaguar cub Frida, who’s honing her survival skills in Brazil’s Caiman Lodge Reserve. Learn how to sneak with mum Gatuna, see sister Anouk help her hide from hungry interlopers, and go on a reckless solo trek that takes a lucky turn.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Lola the Sea Lion Pup - Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentina’s coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Maria’s side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Dora the Baby Muriqui - Feel the enchantment of Brazil’s Atlantic Forest as southern muriqui Dora takes her first steps away from mum Mimi. Get lessons in spider monkey troop dynamics, bone up on tail-hanging technique, and see this baby find her place among her peers.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Thiago the Coati Kitten - Set a course for adventure with Thiago, a brave baby coati. Find out how this raccoon-like fellow sharpens his sniffing and foraging skills, crosses suburban roads near his lush Brazilian forest home, and avoids inanimate and four-legged dangers.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Young Ones - In this episode of Amazing Animal Friends a rescued orphaned rhino befriended by a playful dog and doting sheep, a big bunny rabbit that babysits boisterous baby lambs, and a porcupine that helps two English bulldogs rehabilitate injured animals.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Beast Buddies - Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, an animal shelter puppy that helps a captive cheetah cub get ready for the wild, and an injured monkey who wins over a pack of unfriendly dogs and a lonely mongoose that enjoys foraging with a flock of sheep.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep10

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Ngorongoro Crater - Cursed Heaven - This episode explores Tanzania's Ngorongoro Crater. It looks at what lies within the crater’s walls and examines how the surrounding areas impact life within Ngorongoro.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Dora the Baby Muriqui - Feel the enchantment of Brazil’s Atlantic Forest as southern muriqui Dora takes her first steps away from mum Mimi. Get lessons in spider monkey troop dynamics, bone up on tail-hanging technique, and see this baby find her place among her peers.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Beast Buddies - Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, an animal shelter puppy that helps a captive cheetah cub get ready for the wild, and an injured monkey who wins over a pack of unfriendly dogs and a lonely mongoose that enjoys foraging with a flock of sheep.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Mexico - The mythology of Mexico’s Yucatan Peninsula includes a protective Earth Mother figure, “Ixchel,” who brings fertility and healing to the region. In the shadow of Ixchel, we witness an ancient birthing ritual happening yearly on Mexican beaches: mother green sea turtles haul themselves onto the sands and bury their clutches of eggs.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Foxes - Wild Wild East travels to Prince Edward Island to explore the family life of the Red Fox. These sly creatures are adept at living just on the fringes of the human world.

programme.desc: The Young Ones - In this episode of Amazing Animal Friends a rescued orphaned rhino befriended by a playful dog and doting sheep, a big bunny rabbit that babysits boisterous baby lambs, and a porcupine that helps two English bulldogs rehabilitate injured animals.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Beast Buddies - Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, an animal shelter puppy that helps a captive cheetah cub get ready for the wild, and an injured monkey who wins over a pack of unfriendly dogs and a lonely mongoose that enjoys foraging with a flock of sheep.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rivers - Wild Wild East swims in the Rivers of Nova Scotia. Two species of fish, the Shad and the Gaspereau swim upstream to their ancestral spawning grounds, while a colony of Double-Crested Cormorants thrive on the mouth of the Pictou River.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Skies - Take to the sky to soar with the Bald Eagle. From Cape Breton’s Bras d’Or Lake, to the bird’s overwintering home in the Annapolis Valley, the Eagle’s raise families, hunt and forage for food, and compete for territory with another bird of prey, the Osprey.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Africa's Big Cats - South Africa’s Kruger National Park is one of the largest game reserves on the continent. It contains diverse habitats and is home to hundreds of species of mammals, birds, and reptiles This abundance of animals means many predators, including Africa’s big cats.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Big 5 - From their time as dangerous adversaries to colonialist hunters, who coined the term “the big five,” to the ever-present and considerable challenges of daily life, for the lion, African elephant, leopard, buffalo, and rhino, life isn’t easy when you’re big in the wild.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Dung Beetles: Nature's Recycler - There are more species of beetle in the world than any other animal, and few play a role as important as the humble dung beetle. These tiny counterparts to Africa’s giant plant eaters bring balance to a system that supports life like no other.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Meet the Meerkats - Meerkats may be small and vulnerable, but they’re tenacious characters. Together, they’re a force to be reckoned with. For this growing family, teamwork isn’t just keeping them alive; it’s helping them thrive.

programme.title: Wild Crusades 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Monkey Diaries - Hidden in the jungles of Sri Lanka is the toque macaque. Endemic to the island, these feisty group-living monkeys are found nowhere else on earth. And they are at the heart of the longest primate research project ever undertaken. Dr Wolfgang Dittus is on a quest to understand their complex society.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Bald is Beautiful - After a terrible accident at the nursery forest school, life changes drastically for nine-month-old Alejandra. And at forest school, the students enjoy a poolside classroom where Valentino proves he’s much more than just a class clown.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 Ep7
programme.desc: The Road to Recovery - Beni and Lala get an unexpected visit from Vet Arga, Kesi makes a new friend on Bangamat Island, and Alejandra deals with a new view of the world after the accident at forest school leaves her blind in one eye.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 Ep8
programme.desc: Outbreak! - The race is on to find Tulia and Zalipa, who are missing from Palas Island. And after months of convalescence, Beni returns to forest school but faces another setback at the milk bucket. Meanwhile, the vets keep a close eye on pregnant Dilla.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 Ep9
programme.desc: Dilla and Delilah - The fate of several graduates awaits the next round of wild releases. Meanwhile, runaway Zalipa is found, but her partner in crime, Tulia, is still missing. And Baby Clarita has a complete meltdown as the vets perform surgery on her mother.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 Ep10
programme.desc: Born to Be Wild - Trouble brews when the team makes the final attempt to reunite reluctant mother Dilla with her new baby Delilah. And Alba, the world’s only known albino orangutan, amazes her friends with her unique approach to termite foraging.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rivers - Wild Wild East swims in the Rivers of Nova Scotia. Two species of fish, the Shad and the Gaspereau swim upstream to their ancestral spawning grounds, while a colony of Double-Crested Cormorants thrive on the mouth of the Pictou River.

programme.desc: The Thompson Family - Vikkie and Wayne have a habit of cooking a nightly backup meal for their fussy kids, which has made their shopping bills and food waste skyrocket. Will their kids like what Prue and Rupy have planned?

programme.title: The World's Most Secret Hotels (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Extreme Escapes - In Cambodia we venture to the banks of the Timor Rung River to the Shinta Mani Wild Hotel. A series of 15 tents deep in the wilderness and accessible only after a 3 hour drive from Phnom Penh, access is via a 400 metre zip wire.

programme.title: George Clarke's Old House New Home (S7) Ep1
programme.desc: Stroud and Wootton Bassett - The architect starts out in Stroud, where Phil and Leighla are transforming their ramshackle, listed Georgian farmhouse with an industrial-style extension. George also pays a visit to Wootton Bassett, where he helps a couple flip the layout of their Victorian end-of-terrace home.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA (S10) Ep3
programme.desc: Dippin' Dots - The owner and CEO of Dippin' Dots goes under cover to see where the stress points are at his company.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off (S12) Ep8
programme.desc: Free-From Week - The remaining bakers explore alternative ingredients as they make a Signature without dairy, a hearty vegan Technical and a towering gluten-free celebration cake for the Showstopper.

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals (S14) Ep5
programme.desc: Heat three sees four professional chefs challenged to prepare agnolotti with a pea and mint pesto and pan-fried calves liver with walnut beurre noisette.

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals (S14) Ep6
programme.desc: Heat three continues as the contenders cook their Signature Dishes. The two most impressive chefs will go through to the quarter-final.

programme.desc: Stratford-upon-Avon - In Stratford-upon-Avon, George helps Laura and Jonnie transform their mock-Tudor Edwardian house. In Essex, Nicki's 1920s cottage needs major changes.

programme.title: Donal's Family Kitchen (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: These sloppy joes are slightly alternative but they are ridiculously addictive served up with an Asian inspired slaw and crispy onions. You can make your own crispy onions - or buy them ready made!

programme.desc: For the semi-final, it's social media week. The cooks must level up basic biscuits into Insta-worthy desserts and create a street food menu that would wow on socials.

programme.desc: In heat four, the Skills Test involves eggs benedict and a strawberry dessert. Then each of the four chefs must wow the judges with their Signature Dishes to earn a quarter-final place.

programme.desc: The sewers follow the pattern for a toddler's sailor suit, make fancy dress Halloween outfits and create out-of-school garments from old school uniforms.

programme.desc: Jacqueline and Jamie - Architects Lizzie Fraher and Julian McIntosh compete using virtual reality to remodel a London home. Will the finished build fulfil the dreams of the mother and son who share it?

programme.title: Grand Designs (S20) Ep4
programme.desc: Zimbabwean-born Davi and Matt from Australia set out to build a house in the Chess Valley with a radical multicultural design. They decide to manage the venture themselves, and it's not long before the build veers off course.

programme.desc: Rachel wraps up her Melbourne immersion with a look into the city's current and future food trends. She meets a Thai couple that have crafted a passion for Asian fusion food with a unique all day breakfast menu.

programme.desc: Jamie gets festive with a whole range of delicious no-fuss recipes to help make your Christmas dinner extra-special. From a salmon gravadlax starter to brand new ways to do the turkey, roasties and Brussels & a bonkers new take on the Yorkshire pud.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep31
programme.desc: Egg's Day Out / The Way of the Snake - Archibald takes care of a lost egg for the day. But when the egg starts to crack, Archibald has to get the egg back to its parents. / After Archibald’s arms fall asleep, he joins a dojo ran by snakes and embraces a life without appendages.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep5
programme.desc: The First Picture Show - When Thunk invents the first-ever movie using shadow puppets, everyone in Ahhh! Valley loves it...until they are shocked by the ending.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep5
programme.desc: Lucky And The Appaloosa Adventure - Lucky Spirit and Turo team up to help save an abused horse

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep5
programme.desc: It's a Wonderful LARP / My Sectional Romance - Audrey’s obsession with fun gets her too wrapped up in the Bloogey Boys’ LARPing game. The Harvey Girls and Bloogey Boys battle over who’s the rightful owner of a cool couch.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep5
programme.desc: Ants Ants Revolution / Clamsquatch - A group of fire ants swarm the city and it's up to Burn to race their leader in order to get them to leave. However, a worried Chet gets in the way. // The crew travels to Mississippi for a race in the swamp. When Skidmark goes missing, they fear he has been taken by a creepy mythological creature.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep5
programme.desc: Heavy Metal - The Rescue Riders get stuck in a cave with their rival, Magnus, during a race to find a new source of an important mineral.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep31
programme.desc: Egg's Day Out / The Way of the Snake - Archibald takes care of a lost egg for the day. But when the egg starts to crack, Archibald has to get the egg back to its parents. / After Archibald’s arms fall asleep, he joins a dojo ran by snakes and embraces a life without appendages.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep5
programme.desc: Cloudy With A Chance Of Hugs / Creek Week - The Trolls share a special hug with a special Troll on Hug DayWhen Creek returns to Troll Village everyone is willing to forgive him except Branch.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep15
programme.desc: Unintended Bunnyness/Berry's Pet Threat - Twig accidentally discovers Easter when he gets covered in dryer lint, which makes him look like a bunny while coincidentally stumbling onto a group of hapless eggs that need to be protected from predators. / When Berry forms a close bond with a crow that follows her around like a pet, Rocksy tries to convince Berry that it's only following her around because it's trying to eat her.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep5
programme.desc: Adventure - Puss misses the old days adventuring with his buddy Jack Sprat. Fearful he will leave San Lorenzo, Dulcinea concocts a super special adventure surprise with the orphans. But Jack Sprat shows up with the promise of a damsel in distress… who turns out to be a super scary monster.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep9
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Strange Strife of the Smelly Socktopus - After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep10
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Flustering Mindless Woe of the Flushable Memory Wipes - After being made fun of for sitting in chocolate pudding, George and Harold go into hiding only to come back to find that everybody has forgotten who they are

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep9
programme.desc: Quake, Rattle And Roll - Fishlegs and Meatlug liberate the Gronckles from a menacing dragon that has encroached on their ancestral home, Dark Deep.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep10
programme.desc: Have Dragon Will Travel Pt 1 - The Dragon Riders are surprised to discover who is behind recent attacks on nearby ships – and to learn exactly what the ships are.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep9
programme.desc: Spirit Day - Mega Fat CEO Baby holds a game day at Baby Corp and Boss Baby must find a way to beat Mega Fat CEO Baby at his own game

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep10
programme.desc: Par Avion - When Mega Fat tries to get Boss Baby fired while on an airplane to Pairs, Tim and Staci must prevent a baby meltdown

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep9
programme.desc: Out of the Cave and Onto Thin Ice - After a shocking revelation, Po is determined to get his chi back and Jing decides to face Jindiao

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep10
programme.desc: Return of the Four Constellations - The kids go to the Spirit Realm and meet the Original Four Constellations in the hopes of learning how to defeat Jindiao
